name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Hear hear, I was most impressed with his attempt-to-tie strategy that would pay dividends. Not only was he usually nice to his competition (they'd get to play the next round, and come home with earnings), he'd also guarantee that one of the next players he'd be fighting against is a known variable  (and someone he's already beaten once!) instead of someone new who can potentially beat him, increasing his odds of success.
